name: I`m Turkey
description: I'm Turkey is a simple 2D simulator with elements of survival, with ordinary graphics and usual, but nice plot. In this game you need to overcome various obstacles, playing for a Turkey. The essence of this game is very simple - run, collect items, and try not to die. In this game are 12 levels each of which is a certain number of items that you need to collect, be careful and cautious, traps, sliding platforms and other obstacles will not let you relax. Once you collect all the items on the level for you will open the door, passing through which you will get to the next level. Good luck!
